segments.lesson_summary: Summary of segment 2: In math, we learn about addition and subtraction, using the laws of commutativity, association, and distribution. We also practice problems involving multiplication and division, including multiplying whole tens and hundreds, as well as dividing within the hundreds place with remainders. Understanding the order of operations and using parentheses is also important. We work on multiplication with single-digit numbers, as well as division within the hundreds place with remainders. Overall, math involves a variety of topics and skills that build upon each other, helping us solve complex problems and equations.
